attributes.comment:
My comment is in regards to RIN No. 1125-AA52.

The proposal to increase immigration fees will prevent many people from
becoming citizens. Many immigrants are poor, work multiple jobs, and have large
families. By encreasing fees, we will create a bigger burden on those people who
can't afford to apply.

My parents came to this country to offer us a better way of living. I went to
college and I am a law abiding citizen. I am one of the lucky ones that was able
to go to school and will be able to apply for citizenship.

Please take into consideration all the families that you will be affecting with this
increase....Thank you for your time.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
